programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for three women suspected of drugging and robbing wealthy men; the case leads to personal connections for both Benson and Kat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to investigate an unusual domestic violence case when his neighbor is found injured.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Fin and Phoebe make wedding plans, Benson and Rollins try to help a homeless single mother who's being trafficked in exchange for safe housing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the investigation into a sex-for-housing scheme expands, Benson's loyalty to Garland is tested; Rollins and Carisi try to keep their witnesses on board when a powerful congressman is identified as a suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing witness leads Fin and Kat down a dangerous path; Chief McGrath puts pressure on Garland and Benson to get a conviction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team searches for a serial killer who justifies his crimes with paranoid religious motivation. Richard Thomas and Karen Allen guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler pairs with a bitter cop (David Keith) to track a serial rapist/murderer who was recently released from prison.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape/murder of a woman whose stepfather is a judge (Keir Dullea) known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate two rapes that appear to have been committed by the same man; Mary Beth Hurt and Henry Winkler guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ex-convict who sexually assaulted prostitutes appears to have been killed by a would-be victim, then another homicide suggests the woman may be a manipulative serial killer.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team investigates a string of brutal pharmacy robberies, and Halstead connects with one of the victims about their Army careers; Upton suspects there is more to the story and confides in Voight.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A murder pulls rookie officer Dante Torres into his own neighborhood; as Voight and Atwater help him navigate the case and manage tricky personal dynamics with wary neighbors, Torres realizes his life may be forever changed.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton's dogged pursuit of a missing teenage girl leads the team into a dark web of human trafficking; chief O'Neal becomes involved with the unit's investigation when it becomes evident his son, Sean, has a connection to the missing girl.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater's reactions during a tense arrest are called into question; the team must dig in to uncover key evidence that could aid in the ongoing investigation and clear Atwater's name.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When actionable evidence finally surfaces against Sean O'Neal, Upton and the team work relentlessly to build a case in secret; they discover Sean is more elusive and dangerous than anticipated.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: To distract Intelligence from the investigation into his son, Chief O'Neal forces the team to handle a "dead fish" case; when that dead fish turns into a complicated heater case, Burgess is thrown back into difficult memories from her past.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a shocking discovery, the team begins closing in on Sean O'Neal with every shred of evidence they can find; determined to keep his son out of prison, Chief O'Neal hires a lawyer.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kidd gets a glimpse into Carver's chaotic personal life; Mouch and Herrmann receive an unexpected gift.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 hosts a Halloween open house; Kidd and Severide help a young girl after she gets kicked out of her home.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Herrmann is tasked with fulfilling a man's dying wish; Kidd reflects on her Girls on Fire program after one of her students graduates from the Fire Academy; a heckler harasses Firehouse 51.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Detective Pryma asks for Severide's help on a case involving explosives; Gallo and Carver clash.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 prepares for their semi-annual firehouse inspection; Brett fights to save her paramedicine program; Commander Martin Pearce asks Severide for a favor.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Truck and squad clash after a tense call rescuing a doomsday prepper; Herrmann struggles with Cindy's diagnosis; Violet gives Brett and Gallo dating advice.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 helps Herrmann put on a school fundraiser; Carver's troubled brother comes to town; a grateful citizen is determined to thank Brett and Severide for saving his life.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A corporate troubleshooter survives a plane crash to spend five years seeking out an existence on a deserted island before returning to civilization with an altered view of his old life and values.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Members of Firehouse 51 are dismayed to learn their boundaries have been redrawn to overlap with an adjacent station, and problems quickly arise; Casey and Gallo hunt a missing piece of equipment; Brett and Foster find themselves at odds.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A pest control problem forces the 51 team to temporarily bunk with Firehouse 20; all under the same roof, Casey clashes with Capt. Delaney, while Foster, Kidd and Brett fear Capt. Leone has it out for them; Boden mulls a procedural overhaul.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An estranged son and a former patient are the prime suspects in the murder of a prominent doctor and the rape of his wife.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a corporate mogul is found murdered, evidence points to his son, whom the detectives suspect was seduced by his stepmother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad spends New Year's Eve tracking down an Amber Alert, and Carisi faces off against counselor Rafael Barba in an emotional courtroom battle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-profile activist suspects her sister has been kidnapped by a hate group; Garland and Benson push for change with NYPD brass; Kat gets some good news.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A corporate troubleshooter survives a plane crash to spend five years seeking out an existence on a deserted island before returning to civilization with an altered view of his old life and values.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a young woman's death reveals that she and other women were recently accused of a raping a male stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 6, is shot and then abandoned in an emergency room by his fearful mother, sending detectives in search of his missing family and the gunman.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Fin are forced to team up to investigate a rape-murder case in which a police officer (guest star Michael O'Keefe) might be the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler races against time to determine if a convicted man on death row also murdered and raped another victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a cellist's (Tamara Gorski) orchestra conductor (Michael Nader) after she is brutally attacked in her apartment.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Assistant DA Cabot jeopardizes the detectives' careers and her own when she exceeds legal limits to collect evidence against a serial child-abuser.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a baby's finger in a rape victim's purse, their investigation widens to encompass three generations of women harboring secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate to determine whether a 22-year-old with Down syndrome is pregnant as a result of rape, as her mother contends.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a transsexual is found murdered in a church, suspicion falls on a priest (Eric Stoltz) who resigned from a parochial school after rumors of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler clash with an assistant U.S. attorney (Pam Grier) when their rape victim and their prime suspect disappear into witness protection.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: On his 11th birthday Harry Potter learns he is the orphaned son of two wizards and is invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry where he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.
